Text.Page:
Ghilliedhus sprout from a sort of "prime ghilliedhu." It’s usually the biggest one… and the most dangerous.

If we can identify and destroy that one, the others will be too afraid to stick around.

I’ll take Anya to safety, back in the village. I’ll be back as soon as I can. Meanwhile, see if you can find the prime ghilliedhu.
<PCNAME> succeeded in defeating Varkas, the source of the ghilliedhu invasion, then found and collected some ghilliedhu seeds...hopefully preventing any more ghilliedhu invasions.

Well done.
I thought it would be tough, but you made it look so easy.
I’ll give you a mount as a reward.
Open your inventory and use Riding Skill: Bay Gelding and go to Shadetree.
I’ll meet you there."I’ll be right there."

You came earlier than I thought. I was debating if I should go pick you up. This is good.
Head Researcher Glennock has been looking for you.Did something urgent happen?
